Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Kaiser::
       The clarity of his thoughts return to normal in a flash.  His speedy 
talons deflecting the slashes, he fails to notice the kick which catches him 
in the side.  He rolls with it and the blast clips is wing sending him into a 
spiral.  Transforming he lands on his feet and looks back up at Devilcat.  
"You are good but you have no honor."  He draws his scimitars and, grimacing 
through the pain, launches himself back up at him.

--part1_17a.16c87024.2b83a3a2_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
